mapper.select: select * from (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(join_date,'yy/MM/dd')) AS gdate, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM anafor_user GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(join_date,'yy/MM/dd')) ORDER BY gdate) where gdate between to_char(to_Date(#{lWeek},'yy/MM/dd')) and to_char(to_Date(#{today},'yy/MM/dd') +1)

select * from (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(order_date,'yy/MM/dd')) AS gdate, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM shop GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(order_date,'yy/MM/dd')) ORDER BY gdate) where gdate between to_char(to_Date(#{lWeek},'yy/MM/dd')) and to_char(to_Date(#{today},'yy/MM/dd') +1)
select rownum no, name,cnt, to_Char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') order_date from shop where to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
select rownum no, writer, title, to_Char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from notice where to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} and code= 'N03' and reply='N'
select rownum no, user_name, user_id, user_gender, to_Char(join_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') join_date from anafor_user where to_char(join_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
